name: Bootskell
overview: A challenging Arcade game in which you need to kill the enemies in each of the many levels by squashing them with blocks. Bootskell is an Arcade game as a clone of Pengo, which was released by Sega in 1982. The player takes on the roll of Bootskell who lives in Antarctica. The game takes place in a Labyrinth made of Ice blocks and guarded by Purple Ghosts. The aim of the game is to survive as long as possible by trying to eliminate all the ghosts throughout the 60+ levels by crushing them with Ice blocks. Just be aware they can also do the same to you!
